author: rwaldhoff
msg: (You may want to take a look at these)
* Removing mention of and links to "directory", which doesn't exist, and doesn't seem like it will for quite some time.
* Adding document enumerating the components, a brief description of each, and indicating their current status.
* I *think* that component.xml document supercedes the old sandbox.xml and commons.xml documents, so I removed the links to them from the index and project files
